editPage.managerConflictSolution2: Change the role to "Employee" instead of "Manager"
editPage.managerConflictSolution3: Remove the current manager from that department first
editPage.passwordHelp: Leave blank to keep the same password

attendance.lateArrivalDescription: Specify how many minutes the employee was late. This will be added to their attendance record.
attendance.earlyDepartureDescription: Specify how many minutes early the employee left. This will be marked in their attendance record.
attendance.breakDescription: Record break duration for this employee. Select the number of hours they will be on break.
attendance.backendValidationCheckIn: All calculations are done server-side. New check-in time must be before check-out time.
attendance.reasonForEditCheckIn: Why are you editing the check-in time?
attendance.backendValidationCheckOut: All calculations are done server-side. Check-out time must be after check-in time.
attendance.reasonForEditCheckOut: Why are you editing the check-out time?
attendance.backendCalculationDescription: All time calculations are performed server-side for security.
